InstructionData.Title: Storm Warning System
InstructionData.Author: SMiLeY.NET
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias Self db
alias StormState r1 alias StormCountdown r2 alias AlertPlayed r3 alias MusicPlayed r4 alias CurrentSolarAngle r5 alias CurrentSolarHorizontal r6 alias GrowlightActive r7
define StormIncoming 1 define StormActive 2 define SoundStormIncoming 18 define SoundStormMusic 7 define KlaxonHash HASH("StructureKlaxon") define WeatherStationHash HASH("StructureWeatherStation") define FlashingLightsHash HASH("StructureFlashingLight") define WarningLights HASH("Flashing Light - Storm Warning") define DaySensorHash HASH("StructureDaylightSensor") define SmallLEDHash HASH("StructureConsoleLED5") define StormLED HASH("LED - Storm Countdown") define GrowLightHash HASH("StructureGrowLight") define SolarTotal 180 define NighttimeAngle 112.5
Reset: sbn FlashingLightsHash WarningLights On 0 sb KlaxonHash On 0 sb KlaxonHash Mode SoundStormIncoming sb KlaxonHash Volume 100 move AlertPlayed 0 move MusicPlayed 0 j Main
Main: yield jal HandleGrowlights jal HandleStorm jal TimeToSunrise sleep 10 j Reset
HandleGrowlights: lb CurrentSolarAngle DaySensorHash SolarAngle Maximum slt GrowlightActive CurrentSolarAngle NighttimeAngle sb GrowLightHash On GrowlightActive j ra
HandleStorm: lb StormState WeatherStationHash Mode Maximum lb StormCountdown WeatherStationHash NextWeatherEventTime Maximum beq StormState StormIncoming IncomingStorm beq StormState StormActive ActiveStorm j ra
IncomingStorm: # TODO: Play verbal alert periodically between music sbn SmallLEDHash StormLED Setting StormCountdown sbn FlashingLightsHash WarningLights On 1 beqal AlertPlayed 0 PlayAlert j Main
PlayAlert: sbn FlashingLightsHash WarningLights On 1 sb KlaxonHash On 1 sbn SmallLEDHash StormLED Color Color.Red move AlertPlayed 1 j ra
ActiveStorm: sbn SmallLEDHash StormLED Setting StormCountdown sbn SmallLEDHash StormLED Color Color.Red beqal MusicPlayed 0 PlayMusic j Main
PlayMusic: sbn FlashingLightsHash WarningLights On 1 sb KlaxonHash On 1 sb KlaxonHash Mode SoundStormMusic move MusicPlayed 1 j ra
TimeToSunrise: # TODO: Handle horizontal modification lb CurrentSolarAngle DaySensorHash SolarAngle Maximum sbn SmallLEDHash StormLED Color Color.Yellow sbn SmallLEDHash StormLED Setting CurrentSolarAngle yield j ra
